info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS Green Bay WI
info.description:
Latest webcams and surface observations indicated areas of dense fog, with visibilities of 1/4 mile or less, were expanding across central and northern Door County this evening. At 7:30 pm the dense fog extended from a few miles north of Sturgeon Bay to Valmy, northward to Baileys Harbor to Sister Bay and to Deaths Door and Washington Island. The webcam at the Northport Pier Ferry Dock indicated the visibility was down to less than 100 yards.
The dense fog is expected to continue through the rest of the evening into Tuesday morning. The dense fog is also expected to expand southward across southern Door County, including the city of Sturgeon Bay. If you have travel plans tonight, slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. Allow extra room between you and the car in front of you and use your low beam headlights.

parameter.value: AREAS OF DENSE FOG ACROSS CENTRAL AND NORTHERN DOOR COUNTY THIS EVENING
